at_compline: Have mercy on us, O God, in the greatness of Your compassion, we pray You, hear us and have mercy.
after_compline: Let us pray for our most holy universal Pontiff N., Pope of Rome.
May God save him and give him mercy.
For our civil authorities.
May God save them and give them mercy.
For our most blessed Patriarch N., for our most reverend Metropolitan N.; for our God-loving Bishop N..
May God save them and give them mercy.
For all Catholic bishops.
May God save them and give them mercy.
For the noble benefactors of this holy church [monastery].
May God save them and give them mercy.
For our spiritual fathers, and for all our brothers and sisters in Christ.
May God save them and give them mercy.
For those who are absent and those who are travelling.
May God protect them and have mercy on them.
For those who are kind to us.
May God reward them and have mercy on them.
For those who serve and who have served in this holy church [monastery].
May God save them and give them mercy.
For those who hate us and for those who love us.
May God forgive them and give them mercy.
For the release of captives.
May God ransom them and have mercy on them.
For the sick and suffering.
May God cure them and have mercy on them.
For those living in anxiety and poverty.
May God visit them and have mercy on them.
For all orthodox Christians.
May God save them and give them mercy.
For an abundance of the fruits of the earth.
May God grant an increase of the friuts of the earth.
after_compline_for_the_dead: For the benefactors of this holy church [monastery].
May God grant them remembrance and rest.
May God grant them remembrance and rest.
May God grant them remembrance and rest.
For those who have given up their lives for the Christian faith.
May God grant them remembrance and rest.
For those who lie buried here, those listed and all Christians who have departed from this life.
